metadata.title: CVE-2024-37384 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Roundcube Webmail before 1.5.7 and 1.6.x before 1.6.7 allows XSS via listcolumns from user preferences.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-37384` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

roundcube - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm4
roundcube-core - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm4
roundcube-mysql - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm4
roundcube-pgsql - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm4
roundcube-plugins - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm4
roundcube-sqlite3 - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm4
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: roundcube package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3.6+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm4').
